entries.@pve_tutorial_shooting_hint: Press and hold %fire% to shoot / %zoom% to aim
entries.@pve_tutorial_jumping_hint: Press %jump% to jump over obstacles
entries.@pve_tutorial_grenades_hint: Press %toss_grenade_2% to throw a grenade
entries.@pve_tutorial_ultimate_hint: Ultimate ability ready. Press %select_item_slot_special_weapon% to activate.
entries.@pve_tutorial_revive_hint: Press %use% to perform a revive action
entries.@pve_tutorial_smoke_hint: Use a smoke grenade to conceal yourself. Press %toss_grenade_1% to throw.
entries.@pve_tutorial_zipline_hint: Use a zipline to get down
entries.@pve_tutorial_cover_hint: Take cover to restore your health
entries.@pve_tutorial_reequip: Press %toggle_esc_menu% to choose another weapon
